member.name: T:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphOperations
member.summary: Defines operations that act on s.

member.name: M:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphOperations.Contract``2(Atom.Math.Graph.Edge{``0,``1},Atom.Math.Graph.Graph{``0,``1},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes the specified Edge{TVertexData, TEdgeData} from the specified Graph{TVertexData, TEdgeData}; contracting the graph along the removed edge in the process.
member.remarks: A "contraction" of a graph G along the edge e is the result of deleting the edge e from G and then identifying its endpoints. We imagine that the edge e is topologically shrunk ("contracted") to a point, and we denote the result by G/e. The word "contraction" refers to the operation aswell as to the resulting graph.
member.typeparam: The type of data stored within the vertices of the Graph.
The type of data stored within the edges of the Graph.
member.param: States whether double edges are discarded.

member.name: M:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphOperations.Cut``2(Atom.Math.Graph.Vertex{``0,``1},Atom.Math.Graph.Graph{``0,``1})
member.summary: Removes the specified Vertex{TVertexData, TEdgeData} and the Edge{TVertexData, TEdgeData}s that are connected to it. After that the vertices previously connected over the removed vertex are connected using new edges.
member.typeparam: The type of data stored within the vertices of the Graph.
The type of data stored within the edges of the Graph.

member.name: M:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphOperations.EdgeComplement``2(Atom.Math.Graph.Graph{``0,``1})
member.summary: Gets the edge complement Graph of the specified .
member.typeparam: The type of data stored within the vertices of the Graph.
The type of data stored within the edges of the Graph.
member.returns: The edge-complement graph of the graph.

member.name: M:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphOperations.Cross``2(Atom.Math.Graph.Graph{``0,``1},Atom.Math.Graph.Graph{``0,``1},System.Func{Atom.Math.Graph.Vertex{``0,``1},Atom.Math.Graph.Vertex{``0,``1},``0})
member.summary: Calculates the cartesian product of the given Graphs.
member.remarks: The cartesian product of the graphs G and G' is denoted G x G' and defined to be the graph with the vertex set Vg x Vg' and the edge set (Eg x Vg')u(Vg x Eg').
member.typeparam: The type of data stored within the vertices of the Graph.
The type of data stored within the edges of the Graph.
member.param: The function that is responsible for mapping two vertices together.
member.returns: The cartesian product of the given Graphs.

member.summary: Joins (also sometimes called suspense) the given Graphs into a single Graph by connecting all vertices of the Graph with all vertices of the Graph.

The type of data stored within the edges of the Graph.
member.returns: The suspension of the given graphs.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.EdgeAlreadyExists
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Such an Edge already exists.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.EdgeAlreadyExistsFromXToY

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.EdgeDataIsNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The data stored in an Edge of the Graph is null. This is invalid for this operation..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.EdgeGraphDirectedMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Edge <-> Graph - IsDirected mismatch. A directed graph can only contain directed edges and visa versa..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.GraphDirectionMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This operation requires the Graphs to be both directed or undirected..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.GraphDoesntAllowSelfLoopAdded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This Graph doesn't allow Edges that start and end at the same Vertex. (Self Loops).

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.GraphHasCycles
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Graph contains cycles. This is invalid for this operation..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.GraphIsEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Graph is empty. This is invalid for this operation..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.NoMatchingVertexFoundInGraph
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No matching Vertex has been found in the Graph..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.OperationOnlyValidonDirectedGraph
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This operation is only valid on a directed Graph..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.OperationOnlyValidOnSimpleGraphs
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This operation is only valid on simple graphs that contain no self-loops or multiple edges..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.VertexAlreadyExistsInGraph
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Vertex already exists in the Graph..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.VertexCouldNotBeFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Vertex could not be found..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.VertexCountIsZero
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The vertex-count is zero..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.VertexNotPartOfEdge
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Vertex is not part of the Edge..

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.GraphErrorStrings.VoltageXOfVoltageGraphNotPartOfSpecifiedVoltageGroupOrderY

member.name: T:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2
member.summary: A track is a succession of vertices which have been visited. Thus when it leads to the target node, it is easy to return the result path. These objects are contained in Open and Closed lists. This class can't be inherited.
member.typeparam: The type of data stored within the vertices of the Graph.
The type of data stored within the edges of the Graph.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.End
member.summary: Gets or sets the Vertex at which this Track ends.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.PreviousTrack
member.summary: Gets or sets the Track prior of this Track.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the targeted track.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.Heuristic
member.summary: Gets or sets the heuristic that is used to calcualte the value.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.Weight
member.summary: Gets the weight of this Track.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.Succeed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this Track has reached its end.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.NumberOfEdgesVisited
member.summary: Gets the number of edges that have been visited after traversing the Track queue until this Track.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.DijkstraHeuristicBalance
member.summary: Gets or sets the coefficient which balances the respective influences of Dijkstra and the Heuristic must belong to [0; 1]. -> 0 will minimize the number of nodes explored but will not take the real cost into account. -> 0.5 will minimize the cost without developing more nodes than necessary. -> 1 will only consider the real cost without estimating the remaining cost.

member.name: P:Atom.Math.Graph.Track`2.Evaluation
